overview: Sepultura & Les Tambours du Bronx at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 19, 2013. Setlist: 01. Kaiowas / 02. Spectrum / 03. Refuse/Resist / 04. Sepulnation / 05.
